name: youtube_script_writer
title: Youtube Script Writer
description: AppyDave This workflow is used to write a script for a YouTube video for AI-TLDR.

steps.name: Basic Idea
steps.title: Basic Idea
steps.prompt:
Create 5 simple project ideas on: [idea]

Idea or title should be three to seven words long

steps.name: Basic Factsheet
steps.title: Basic Factsheet
steps.prompt:
I need you to gather detailed and reliable information about the 
"[idea]".

The information should be based on recent discussions, reviews, and credible sources available on the internet. Please ensure that the data is comprehensive and unbiased, providing enough detail to generate well-informed articles.

The information should include the following:
Overview: A brief description of the product, including its purpose and main features.
Company Background: Information about the company that developed the product, including its history and reputation.
User Reviews: Summarized insights from user reviews and testimonials, highlighting common praises and complaints.
Pricing: Details about the pricing plans and any available free trials or discounts.
Comparison: A comparison with similar products in the market, noting any unique selling points or disadvantages.
Use Cases: Examples of how different types of users or businesses are utilizing the product.
Updates and Roadmap: Information about recent updates and future plans for the product.
Expert Opinions: Insights from industry experts or notable publications.
Community and Support: Details about the community support, forums, and customer service quality.
Please ensure that all information is up-to-date and from credible sources, avoiding any hallucinations or unverified data. The tone of the information must be witty and informative

steps.name: Video ideas
steps.title: Video Ideas
steps.prompt:
I want to do a YouTube video on the following idea:
[idea]

The video should only be about three minutes long
The video is an ATLDR type of video
What are five types of videos that I could do?

Here is the factsheet:
[basic_factsheet]

steps.name: Expanded Factsheet
steps.title: Expanded Factsheet
steps.prompt:
I need you to expand the basic factsheet you created for idea: [idea]
I need the expanded factsheet to include information 
required for this type of video [video_idea]

Here is the basic factsheet
[basic_factsheet]

steps.name: Video Meta Data
steps.title: Video Meta Data
steps.prompt:
I will give you a detailed factsheet about idea: [idea]
For a video idea of: [video_idea]

I need you to create the following meta data:

5 engaging titles
10 keywords
5 topics

Here's the fact sheet: 
[expanded_factsheet]
